string.value: Porchay, who stays with the Whalians in the Generator Room, says that there is an emergency. I wonder what it is?

I can't believe that the Whalians have completely run out of food! According to Porchay, Kenta has plenty of food ingredients so I should go to #bKenta#k and talk to her. I should take Porchay's letter with me too, right?
I gave Porchay's letter to Kenta.
Hello, traveler? Are you here at the Generator Room to see this rock? Isn't Shining Stone amazing? And the Whalians that control the rock... they're amazing too, right?
Since you've made your way all the way down here, can I ask you for a favor? Not many people pass through this area, and we're in a bit of trouble right now.

The Whalians here don't eat what the normal people eat. They eat something that can only be found in the sea. They always ate that, but... now that we've spent a considerable amount of time here on land, the ingredients have run out.

My cousin Kenta, who lives in Aquarium, can make something for them. That's why I am here to ask you for a favor. Can you send this letter that I wrote about that food to #bKenta#k? You can find him at the Aquarium Zoo.
I guess you don't have time to help me. Who should I ask, then?
You're here to give me a letter? It's from Porchay?
Oh... so it's about the special food that the Whalians eat. They only eat certain things, so... let's see if there's any left.
You can find Kenta at the Aquarium.
Kenta is at the Aquarium Zoo, watching over the animals.
Did you lose the letter? Oh no... I'll write you another one. Don't lose it again, okay?
Now, please give this letter to Kenta.
